pageContext.description: Dimensions: EL (chord across ends) 47.0mm; max. d. head 4.3 x 4.6; d. shank at bend 2.4 x 2.6; d at bread 1.7,Typology: cylindrical head v. sl. tapering towards approx. flat top with rounded angle at junction; traces of 6 horiz. incised grooves - poss. one spiral; greatly sloped underside of head leading to approx. round sec. shank.,Condition: tip broken off - not obviously  recent - sur. sim. to rest; bend in shank pres. dam.,Attached Material: white deposits thinly spread - poss. chalk.
pageContext.surface: Traces of olive green patina, mainly deteriorated to dry pale green sur.; little dark brown.
pageContext.toSearch: Highdown Hill, South Downs National Park, Ferring, Worthing, West Sussex Bn12 6pf, UK
pageContext.remarks: Labels/Markings: black ink: 3477,PIF; AFI; DF(C); SI; CI; SN Oct. 79; Source: MV
